subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] This is what I'm talking about!
author: David Koenig
full_text:
WOW ... Pretty classy stuff :-)

On Mon, May 25, 2009 at 11:31 PM, Frank Sumption
<purplealiengirl@...>wrote:

>
>
>  Why I've had enough of these insane idiots in the so called paranormal.
> God forbid anyone should question their little pearls of wisdom flowing from
> their sacred keyboards.
>
>  I''ve said it before, and I'll say it again, I do this work for my own
> curiosity, I don't seek fame and fortune like these others do, and I have no
> ego to puff up to the world. I do not care if anyone uses my boxes, I don't
> even sell the crap. It ain't gonna matter---the comet is on it's way! Y'all
> have three years, I'd use the time wisely.
>
>  I left the name off this, but anyone can probably figure out who sent it,
> the same person that attacks many researchers in this field.
>
> "Frank,
>
> You have a big mouth on that piece of shit group evp-itc come over to
> the---- group where I can respond to your fuckin retarded rants. You call me
> a crack head, you senile old idiot, don't hate people for being your
> superior in the field just because your boxes are crap now and nobody uses
> them for anything other than dust collecters. If I were you I would go back
> into the bathroom sit on the bowl and think about what an obscure hasbeen
> asshole you have become.
>
> Come to my group and open your mouth and I'll take the wind right out of
> your fuckin sails.
>
> All is possible, nothing is probable"
>
>  
>
